definition: to gather/to collect/collected works/classifier for sections of a TV series etc: episode

sentences.english: So there are a lot of photographs in this collection that no one has seen before.
sentences.chinese: 所以，在这部精选集里有很多照片是没有人看到过的。

sentences.english: In recent years Selections of Poems by Niu Han were published in South Korea and Japan.
sentences.chinese: 近几年日本和韩国译编出版了牛汉诗选集。

sentences.english: His poems and articles have been adopted by many anthologies and dictionaries in China.
sentences.chinese: 诗文成果名录被多种选集和辞书登载。

sentences.english: The Poems for Imperial Reading is a rarely extant collection of the Tang writings.
sentences.chinese: 《御览诗》为现存少数唐人选集的一种。

sentences.english: In the  selection the  lecturer  neglected the  negligible  negative  reflection on the election.
sentences.chinese: 在选集中演讲者忽视了对选举的微不足道的消极反思。

sentences.english: Collection of HeYue Yingling was a set of characteristic selected poems in the properous Tang Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 《河岳英灵集》为盛唐颇具特色的诗选集。

sentences.english: It's Wikipedia in your pocket, no strings attached.
sentences.chinese: 维基选集就在你口袋中，没有什么数据线。

sentences.english: His Selected Poems was very popular among young people.
sentences.chinese: 他的诗选集在年轻人中很流行。

sentences.english: This compilation was first issued on vinyl in 1984.
sentences.chinese: 这张精选集在1984年首次以唱片形式发行。

sentences.english: This collection of poetry includes ten modern poems.
sentences.chinese: 这本诗词选集收录了十首今体诗。

sentences.english: I am a poet and have published 2 anthologies and am busy on a third.
sentences.chinese: 我是一个诗人，出版了2选集和上午忙于三分之一。

sentences.english: I call it "The Best of Herb."
I call it The Best of Herb.
In the selection the lecturer neglected the negligible negative
sentences.chinese: 在选集中演讲者忽视了对选举的微不足道的消极反思。

sentences.english: The story has often been anthologized.
sentences.chinese: 这个故事常被收入选集。

definition: a series of books/a collection of books
